2021-02-13.name: Free Entrance Day at Minnesota state parks
2021-02-13.summary: Entrance to all 75 Minnesota state parks and recreation areas is free today and also on June 12 and Nov. 26.

2021-02-13.name: Sky Circus on Ice
2021-02-13.summary: This free kite festival hosted by Lake Lawn Resort features flying lessons, a kite-making workshop, an aerial candy drop, a snow slide, indoor and outdoor kite-flying performances, a snow-carving class and snow and ice sculptures on Delavan Lake and downtown.

2021-02-13.name: Grand Marais Winter Carnival
2021-02-13.summary: On the east end of Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, this Lake Superior town offers a poker run, a snowman contest, cardboard-sled races, dog-sled rides and music.

2021-02-13.name: Ice Lantern Festival
2021-02-13.summary: See ice lanterns created by artists and students in this arty southwest Wisconsin town and visit the cupcake/cookie/hot chocolate bar as well as the ice bar.

2021-02-27.name: Virtual International Festival
2021-02-27.summary: Dancers, musicians, storytellers and puppeteers representing traditions from around the world converge on the Overture Center for the Arts on State Street for this free festival.

2021-02-27.name: Winterfest
2021-02-27.summary: In this St. Croix River town, there will be a parka pub crawl, ice maze, stein-holding and beard contests, axe-throwing, ice carving, ice bowling, a snow labyrinth, bubble-wrap races, an ice-cream social and a fire and ice bar.

2021-02-27.name: Chili Ice Walk
2021-02-27.summary: Between noon and 4 p.m., walk downtown to see ice sculpting, sample chili from eight restaurants and go on a scavenger hunt in shop windows.

2021-02-28.name: Virtual International Festival
2021-02-28.summary: Dancers, musicians, storytellers and puppeteers representing traditions from around the world converge on the Overture Center for the Arts on State Street for this free festival.

2021-02-28.name: Winterfest
2021-02-28.summary: In this St. Croix River town, there will be a parka pub crawl, ice maze, stein-holding and beard contests, axe-throwing, ice carving, ice bowling, a snow labyrinth, bubble-wrap races, an ice-cream social and a fire and ice bar.

2021-02-05.name: Knickerbocker Ice Festival
2021-02-05.summary: The festival in this town east of Madison includes such events as a fish toss, snowball-eating contest, dad-sled race, chili cook-off and Iceberg Open golf tournament. There's ice carving and ice wine, too.

2021-02-06.name: Knickerbocker Ice Festival
2021-02-06.summary: The festival in this town east of Madison includes such events as a fish toss, snowball-eating contest, dad-sled race, chili cook-off and Iceberg Open golf tournament. There's ice carving and ice wine, too.

2021-02-06.name: Winterfest Sled Dog Race
2021-02-06.summary: More than 100 mushers compete, and there will also be skijoring, children's and celebrity races.

2021-02-07.name: Winterfest Sled Dog Race
2021-02-07.summary: More than 100 mushers compete, and there will also be skijoring, children's and celebrity races.

2021-02-20.name: Silver Mine Ski Jumping Championships
2021-02-20.summary: Watch top skiers from North America and Europe compete at Silver Mine Hill, above the Chippewa River on the southwest edge of town.

2021-02-21.name: Silver Mine Ski Jumping Championships
2021-02-21.summary: Watch top skiers from North America and Europe compete at Silver Mine Hill, above the Chippewa River on the southwest edge of town.
